descriptionHtml:
[u]What is this?

[/u]A small player-owned home in Solitude. Currently decorated in a fairly generic way, as it wasn't made for any particular style of character. I made this to match my ideas for a home, which means a home that is secluded, small/cosy, with plenty of storage and functionality. Features:

[list][*]Combined living/bedroom[/*]
[*]Combined forge/armory[/*]
[*]Study/library room[/*]
[*]Alchemy/enchanting room[/*]
[*]And a shrine to the daughter of twilight... Always one of my preferred daedra.[/*]
[/list]
A reasonable amount of storage can be found in the living room. Various other containers and weapon/armor racks can be found throughout the home. All containers should be non-respawning.


[u]Where is it?

[/u]Solitude. Can be accessed by finding your way up and behind Angeline's Aromatics. Starts unlocked, although you will have to find a few keys to access each room inside.


[u]Still to do:[/u]

For all intents and purposes the home functions properly. A few things I still want to do are:

[list][*]Tidy up positioning of objects in each room.[/*]
[*]A bit more clutter/decoration.[/*]
[*]Fix the bookshelves in the study (for some reason only the top shelf on each works, and at a reduced capacity).[/*]
[/list]
author: PelinalWhitestrake
